Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.15 Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika » 1.15.3 Aniyatapada » 1.15.3.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika
Aniyatapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
445.
967Hetuṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
968Nahetuṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
969Hetuṃ aniyatañca nahetuṃ aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
446.
970Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava…pe…  kamme nava, vipāke nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Nahetu-naārammaṇa >>
